flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 8 more marbles than Allison who has 28 so Angela has 8+28 = <<8+28=36>>36 marbles
Albert has three times as many marbles as Angela who has 36 so Albert has 3*36 = <<3*36=180>>180 marbles
Albert and Allison together have 180+28 = <<180+28=208>>208 marbles
#### 208

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 180. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
